## LiveSelector.nth() method

Select only nth element

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
nth(n: number): LiveSelector<T, SingleMode>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  n | <code>number</code> | Select only nth element, allow negative number. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`LiveSelector<T, SingleMode>`

## Example


```ts
ls.nth(-1)

```
